title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Clues

properties.name: description
properties.value: This page contains a list of tasks that are related to Treasure Trails. Each of these tasks are listed in-game under the 'Global' area.

content:
This page contains a list of tasks that are related to Treasure Trails. Each of these tasks are listed in-game under the 'Global' area.

Contents

  • 1 Easy
  • 2 Medium
  • 3 Hard
  • 4 Elite

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete a Beginner Clue Scroll Complete a beginner clue scroll by opening a Reward Casket. N/A N/A
Complete an Easy Clue Scroll Complete an easy clue scroll by opening a Reward Casket. N/A N/A
Gain a Unique Item From a Beginner Clue Gain a unique item from a Beginner Clue Scroll Reward Casket. N/A N/A
Gain a Unique Item From an Easy Clue Gain a unique item from an Easy Clue Scroll Reward Casket. N/A N/A
Burn Some Coloured Logs Burn some logs that have been coloured with a firelighter. N/A N/A
Eat some Purple Sweets Eat some Purple Sweets. N/A N/A

Gain 10 Unique Items From Medium Clues Gain 10 unique items from Medium Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Gain 5 Unique Items From Hard Clues Gain 5 unique items from Hard Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Fill 5 Beginner Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 5 slots in the Beginner Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 5 Easy Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 5 slots in the Easy Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 5 Medium Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 5 slots in the Medium Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 3 Hard Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 3 slots in the Hard Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 3 Elite Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 3 slots in the Elite Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Equip a Trimmed Amulet Equip a Trimmed Amulet. N/A N/A

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.


Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements

Gain a Unique Item From an Elite Clue Gain a unique item from an Elite Clue Scroll Reward Casket. N/A N/A
Gain a Unique Item From a Master Clue Gain a unique item from a Master Clue Scroll Reward Casket. N/A N/A
Gain 35 Unique Items From Beginner Clues Gain 35 unique items from Beginner Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Gain 35 Unique Items From Easy Clues Gain 35 unique items from Easy Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Gain 25 Unique Items From Medium Clues Gain 25 unique items from Medium Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Gain 20 Unique Items From Hard Clues Gain 20 unique items from Hard Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Gain 10 Unique Items From Elite Clues Gain 10 unique items from Elite Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Gain 10 Unique Items From Master Clues Gain 10 unique items from Master Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Fill 10 Beginner Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 10 slots in the Beginner Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A

Equip a Full Gilded or Trimmed Wizard Set Equip either a full set of gilded Wizard robes or a full set of trimmed Wizard robes. N/A N/A
Equip a Full Gilded Set Equip either a full set of gilded Rune armour or a full set of gilded Dragonhide armour. N/A N/A
Equip a Full Vestment Set Equip a full set of Vestment robes with all pieces aligned to the same God. 40 Prayer
40 Magic 		N/A
Equip a Full God Rune Set Equip a full set of God Rune armour (helmet, body and legs) with all pieces aligned to the same God. 40 Defence N/A
Equip a Full God Dragonhide Set Equip a full set of God Dragonhide armour with all pieces aligned to the same God. 70 Ranged
40 Defence 		N/A
Equip an Ornament Kit Item Equip any item that has an Ornament Kit attached to it. N/A N/A
Equip Some Ranger Boots Equip a pair of Ranger Boots. 40 Ranged N/A

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Gain 50 Unique Items From Hard Clues Gain 50 unique items from Hard Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Gain 25 Unique Items From Elite Clues Gain 25 unique items from Elite Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Gain 25 Unique Items From Master Clues Gain 25 unique items from Master Clue Scroll Reward Caskets. N/A N/A
Fill Every Beginner Clue Collection Log Slot Fill every slot in the Beginner Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 50 Easy Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 50 slots in the Easy Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 40 Medium Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 40 slots in the Medium Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 30 Hard Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 30 slots in the Hard Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 25 Elite Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 25 slots in the Elite Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Fill 25 Master Clue Collection Log Slots Fill 25 slots in the Master Clue section of the Collection Log. N/A N/A
Use the Explore Emote Use the Explore emote. N/A Solve 600 beginner clues
Read a Clueless Scroll Read a Clueless scroll. N/A Solve 400 medium clues
Equip a Heavy Casket Equip a Heavy casket. N/A Solve 200 elite clues
Equip a Scroll Sack Equip a Scroll sack. N/A Solve 100 master clues
Transform into Uri Use the Uri Transform emote. N/A Solve 300 hard clues
